Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Fitness | Lifestyle
Status: TBD/On The Bubble
Network: ITV1 ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Wednesdays at 08:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: December 12, 2012
Ended: December 19, 2012

Weight Loss Ward sees the cameras being given access to the country's biggest and busiest obesity unit as they get an exclusive insight into the battle with the bulge. Sunderland Royal Hospital is at the centre of one of the fattest places in the country and deals with thousands of patients turning to surgery to beat their problems. 
(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-33587)
